trans-unit.source: An activity that supports compensation of its child activities.
trans-unit.target: En aktivitet som stöder kompensation för underordnade aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity allows a developer to specify a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> activity that defines a long-running task that performs their core business logic.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity kan utvecklare att ange en <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>aktivitet som definierar en tidskrävande uppgift som utför sina core affärslogik.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also allows the developer to optionally specify a compensation and confirmation activity to schedule appropriate business logic in the event of errors or successful completion of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det gör också att utvecklare om du vill ange en kompensation och bekräftelsen aktivitet om du vill schemalägga lämpliga affärslogik vid fel eller slutförande av <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: Compensation and confirmation of a CompensableActivity is invoked by using the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> returned by the CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: Ersättning och bekräftelse av en CompensableActivity anropas med hjälp av den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>som returneras av en CompensableActivity.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is an opaque, typed object returned as the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A> argument after successful completion of a CompensableActivity activity’s <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>ett täckande, skrivna objekt returneras som <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A>argument efter slutförande av en CompensableActivity aktivitetens <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A></xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activities to explicitly invoke confirmation and compensation of a CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: Detta <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>används av den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>och <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>aktiviteter att explicit anropa bekräftelse och ersättning av en CompensableActivity.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity can be composed in a nested hierarchical fashion in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity kan sammanställas kapslade hierarkiskt i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Compensation Programming Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Ersättning programmeringsmodell](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger aktiviteten som är schemalagd när den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> körs.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen är skrivskyddad vid körning.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om värdet anges vid körning, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>genereras.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Den aktivitet som är schemalagda när den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> körs.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den aktivitet som är schemalagd när aktiviteten har avbrutits.

trans-unit.source: CancellationHandler can be used to specify custom cancelation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: CancellationHandler kan användas för att ange anpassade annullering för <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>i <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.

trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den aktivitet som är schemalagd när ersättning utförs på den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>.
